## Simple Histogram

This is a program to plot a simple histogram for a set of random numbers

```{r numbers}

rand_numbers <- sample(1000,250)

```

## Including Plots

Generating the histogram

```{r plot}

x_hist <- hist(rand_numbers)
x_hist

```
